role.argrole: entity causing concern or interesting thing

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يهم) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الادارة)) (S-NOM-SBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM ابقاء) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-1 (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN اسرائيل)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC بعيدة) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحرب)))

arg.g: Keeping Israel out of the war

frameset.edef: To intend to or be going to

example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS هم) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP فولي)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN فتح) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN باب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN سيارت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))))))))

arg.g: To open the door of his car
